blocks.content: An integer is odd iff it is one plus twice another integer. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Apr-2014.) (Revised by AV, 19-Jun-2020.)

  ibar(wcel(c0, cz), wrex(s0, cz, wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1))))
  rexbidv(s0, cz, wcel(c0, cz), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1), c0), wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1)))

  eqcom(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1), c0)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cz), wb(wcel(c0, codd), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wrex(s0, cz, wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1))))))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, codd, cz, wrex(s0, cz, wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1))), wrex(s0, cz, wceq(cv(hs0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1))))
  rexbidv(s0, cz, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1)), wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1)))

}

blocks.content: The sum of an odd and an even is odd. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Apr-2014.) (Revised by AV, 20-Jun-2020.)

  oveq1d(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs3))), caddc, nat1, co(nat2, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(cv(hs3), cz)))
  eqcomd(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs3))), co(nat2, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(cv(hs3), cz)))
  adddid(nat2, cv(hs1), cv(hs3), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(cv(hs3), cz)))

  elrab2(hs5, co(c0, caddc, c1), codd, cz, wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1))), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(cv(hs5), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1))))
  rexbidv(hs0, cz, wceq(cv(hs5), co(c0, caddc, c1)), wceq(cv(hs5), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1)))
  eqeq1(cv(hs5), co(c0, caddc, c1), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1))
  dfodd6(hs5, hs0)

  diff.hs3.w(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)), wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat1))), wcel(c1, cz)))

blocks.name: omoeALTV
blocks.content: The difference of two odds is even. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Apr-2014.) (Revised by AV, 20-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm omoeALTV(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, codd), wcel(c1, codd)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), ceven))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(co(c0, cmin, c1), ceven, co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), wa(wcel(c0, codd), wcel(c1, codd)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, codd), wcel(c1, codd), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), co(c0, cmin, c1)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcnd(c0, wcel(c0, codd))
  oddz(c0)
  zcnd(c1, wcel(c1, codd))
  oddz(c1)
  negsub(c0, c1)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, codd), wcel(c1, codd), wcel(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), ceven), wcel(cneg(c1), codd))
  onego(c1)
  opoeALTV(c0, cneg(c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm omoeALTV(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Odd ∧ c1 ∈ Odd)→(c0[-]c1)∈ Even)
} = {
  eqeltrrd((c0[-]c1), ceven, (c0[+]-u(c1)), (c0 ∈ Odd ∧ c1 ∈ Odd))
  syl2an(c0 ∈ Odd, c1 ∈ Odd, (c0[+]-u(c1))=(c0[-]c1), c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  zcnd(c0, c0 ∈ Odd)
  oddz(c0)
  zcnd(c1, c1 ∈ Odd)
  oddz(c1)
  negsub(c0, c1)
  sylan2(c0 ∈ Odd, c1 ∈ Odd, (c0[+]-u(c1))∈ Even, -u(c1)∈ Odd)
  onego(c1)
  opoeALTV(c0, -u(c1))
}

blocks.name: omeoALTV
blocks.content: The difference of an odd and an even is odd. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Apr-2014.) (Revised by AV, 20-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm omeoALTV(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, codd), wcel(c1, ceven)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), codd))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(co(c0, cmin, c1), codd, co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), wa(wcel(c0, codd), wcel(c1, ceven)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, codd), wcel(c1, ceven), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), co(c0, cmin, c1)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcnd(c0, wcel(c0, codd))
  oddz(c0)
  zcnd(c1, wcel(c1, ceven))
  evenz(c1)
  negsub(c0, c1)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, codd), wcel(c1, ceven), wcel(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), codd), wcel(cneg(c1), ceven))
  enege(c1)
  opeoALTV(c0, cneg(c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm omeoALTV(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Odd ∧ c1 ∈ Even)→(c0[-]c1)∈ Odd)
} = {
  eqeltrrd((c0[-]c1), codd, (c0[+]-u(c1)), (c0 ∈ Odd ∧ c1 ∈ Even))
  syl2an(c0 ∈ Odd, c1 ∈ Even, (c0[+]-u(c1))=(c0[-]c1), c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  zcnd(c0, c0 ∈ Odd)
  oddz(c0)
  zcnd(c1, c1 ∈ Even)
  evenz(c1)
  negsub(c0, c1)
  sylan2(c0 ∈ Odd, c1 ∈ Even, (c0[+]-u(c1))∈ Odd, -u(c1)∈ Even)
  enege(c1)
  opeoALTV(c0, -u(c1))
}

blocks.name: oddprmALTV
blocks.content: A prime not equal to ` 2 ` is odd. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Feb-2015.) (Revised by AV, 21-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm oddprmALTV(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cdif(cprime, csn(nat2))), wcel(c0, codd))
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cdif(cprime, csn(nat2))), wcel(c0, codd), wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wne(c0, nat2)))
  eldifsn(c0, cprime, nat2)
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wne(c0, nat2)), wcel(c0, codd), wcel(c0, cz), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cprime), wne(c0, nat2), wcel(c0, cz))
  prmz(c0)
  mtbird(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wne(c0, nat2)), wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0), wo(wceq(nat2, c0), wceq(nat2, nat1)))
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wne(c0, nat2)), wn(wo(wceq(nat2, c0), wceq(nat2, nat1))), wn(wceq(nat2, c0)), wn(wceq(nat2, nat1)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cprime), wne(c0, nat2), wn(wceq(nat2, c0)))
  sylbb(wne(c0, nat2), wn(wceq(nat2, c0)), wne(nat2, c0))
  necom(c0, nat2)
  df-ne(nat2, c0)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wne(c0, nat2)), wn(wceq(nat2, nat1)))
  nesymi(nat2, nat1)
  1ne2()
  ioran(wceq(nat2, c0), wceq(nat2, nat1))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cprime), wne(c0, nat2), wb(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0), wo(wceq(nat2, c0), wceq(nat2, nat1))), wcel(nat2, cn))
  a1i(wne(c0, nat2), wcel(nat2, cn))
  2nn()
  dvdsprime(c0, nat2)
  isodd3(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm oddprmALTV(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(Prime \ { 2 })→ c0 ∈ Odd)
} = {
  sylbi(c0 ∈(Prime \ { 2 }), c0 ∈ Odd, (c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c0 ≠ 2))
  eldifsn(c0, cprime, nat2)
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c0 ≠ 2), c0 ∈ Odd, c0 ∈ ℤ, ¬ 2[||]c0)
  adantr(c0 ∈ Prime, c0 ≠ 2, c0 ∈ ℤ)
  prmz(c0)
  mtbird((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c0 ≠ 2), 2[||]c0, (2 = c0 ∨ 2 = 1))
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c0 ≠ 2), ¬(2 = c0 ∨ 2 = 1), ¬ 2 = c0, ¬ 2 = 1)
  adantl(c0 ∈ Prime, c0 ≠ 2, ¬ 2 = c0)
  sylbb(c0 ≠ 2, ¬ 2 = c0, 2 ≠ c0)
  necom(c0, nat2)
  df-ne(nat2, c0)
  a1i((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c0 ≠ 2), ¬ 2 = 1)
  nesymi(nat2, nat1)
  1ne2()
  ioran(2 = c0, 2 = 1)
  sylan2(c0 ∈ Prime, c0 ≠ 2, (2[||]c0 ↔(2 = c0 ∨ 2 = 1)), 2 ∈ ℕ)
  a1i(c0 ≠ 2, 2 ∈ ℕ)
  2nn()
  dvdsprime(c0, nat2)
  isodd3(c0)
}
